We understand that circumstances may change, and you may need to adjust your membership preferences. Weâ€™re here to make that process as smooth as possible for you. ğŸ™
To pause or cancel your membership, follow this link: Manage Membership. From there, youâ€™ll easily navigate the options, including the refund.
By canceling, you forfeit your D+ store credits, which will disappear from your account and not be refunded. You can always use your points immediately and then return to cancel.
Have a great day!
